author: vors
body:
We have a hard-coded resource name, and because `dotnet cli` force a naming pattern for resources, we have this commit f76838c

```
> git show f76838cc019ee9afee46c2b53c610f796cdd1391
```

``` diff
commit f76838c
Author: Sergei Vorobev <sevoroby@microsoft.com>
Date:   Wed Mar 30 18:00:21 2016 -0700

    Fix hardcoded path to resources in EventLogLogProvider.cs

    Conflicts:
        src/System.Management.Automation/logging/eventlog/EventLogLogProvider.cs

diff --git a/src/System.Management.Automation/logging/eventlog/EventLogLogProvider.cs b/src/System.Management.Automation/logging/eventlog/EventLogLo
index eaecb49..378a467 100644
--- a/src/System.Management.Automation/logging/eventlog/EventLogLogProvider.cs
+++ b/src/System.Management.Automation/logging/eventlog/EventLogLogProvider.cs
@@ -41,7 +41,7 @@ namespace System.Management.Automation
             _eventLog = new EventLog();
             _eventLog.Source = source;

-            _resourceManager = new ResourceManager("Logging", System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly());
+            _resourceManager = new ResourceManager("System.Management.Automation.resources.Logging", System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembl
         }

         internal string SetupEventSource(string shellId)
```

We should address it properly: replace direct ResourceManager usage by generated strongly-typed resources.
title: Remove hard-coded resource name from src/System.Management.Automation/logging/eventlog/EventLogLogProvider.cs
